Comment.Language: On the Feast of the Transfiguration:

Text.Language: Ps/ri m~V]: afsobtf e~jen pitwou n~Yabwr: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
The Son of God, was transfigured on mount Tabor. Save us and have mercy on us.
